# âš ï¸ MOST IMPORTANT NODE
## Stores global configs

# 1ï¸âƒ£
- provide GitHub `repository owner name`, 
- `repository name`
- `repository subfolder` (recommended)

# 2ï¸âƒ£
- `instance_url` - keep .env variables or set up manually
- `webhook_path` - keep .env variables or set up manually
- `webhook_actions` - taken from `Webhook-actions` node

## âš ï¸ ATTENTION: CLOUD USERS!
### Replace `instance_url` with your cloud n8n URL

## Restore Workflow From GitHub
### 2 options: replace existing or create new
